title: The Homicide story
creator_credit: Crawford Productions and HSV Channel 7, Melbourne
brief_description: The story of the making of one episode of the successful Australian television series - Homicide. From the idea for a story in the mind of a writer to the finished product - a matter of fourteen weeks intensive planning and work. We follow all steps of production: from the writing of the script to the final telerecording of thirty minutes of television.
